sessionSummary: Completed Phase 3 items P3.2 (E2E Stabilization) and P3.3 (GenerationQueue Test Coverage). Updated REMEDIATION_PLAN.md to reflect progress. Implemented integration tests for GenerationQueue to verify safe queuing logic.

decisions.rationale: Mocking internal calls within the same module is difficult. Integration test with mocked global.fetch provides better coverage of the actual flow.
alternatives: Refactor service to separate files (too invasive for now)

currentState.status: P3.2 and P3.3 Completed. P3.1 In Progress.
